1.0.name: wordpress/istudio-theme
1.0.description: Inspired by Macintosh, Designed and created by Xu.hel. It is very stylish, widget supported and doesn't require any plugin. Wordpress 3.4 or later is Version to use. Language Support: en_US, zh_CN, zh_TW, zh_HK.
